ascend_skill.desc:
When Miyu grants a shield, grant 1 Seashell stack to that ally, up to 6.
When gaining a Seashell stack, increase shield received by 1% for each stack.
Whenever reaching a set number of Seashell stacks, activate the following effects, based on Miyu's level (1/50/70+).
2 stacks: Increase Defense by 8%/12%/16%.
4 stacks: Increase Attack by 8%/12%/16%.
6 stacks: Increase Defense by 12%/18%/24%.
ascend_skill.name: Guardian of the Sea

ascend_skill.desc: At the start of battle, grant party 1 Seashell stack.
ascend_skill.name: Marionette Dance

ascend_skill.desc: When an ally's remaining HP is below 30%, grant them a shield equal to 28% of Miyu's Defense + 660 for 2 turns. This effect can be activated once per battle.
ascend_skill.name: For my Big Bro!

ascend_skill.desc: Increase the skill levels of Little Mermaid's Song and Poseidon's Blessing by 2.
ascend_skill.name: Self-Reliance

ascend_skill.desc: When an ally uses a Highlight, grant that ally a shield equal to 16% of Miyu's Defense + 480 for 2 turns.
ascend_skill.name: Chasing Dreams

ascend_skill.desc: Increase the skill level of Tide of Dreams increase by 2.
ascend_skill.name: Street Performer

ascend_skill.desc:
Increase maximum number of Seashell stacks to 8.
When Seashell reaches 8 stacks, increase damage by 20%.
ascend_skill.name: Runaway

normal_skill.desc:
Grant a shield to party equal to 29.3%/29.3%/31.6%/31.6% of Miyu's Defense + 1110/1330/1437/1657 for 2 turns, and restore 4 SP.
When an ally's shield is broken, decrease cooldown by 1 action.
Cooldown Time: 8 ally actions
normal_skill.name: Little Mermaid's Song

normal_skill.desc:
For 2 turns, grant a shield to 1 ally equal to 67.2%/67.2%/72.6%/72.6% of Miyu's Defense + 2542/3042/3290/3790 and decrease weakness damage taken by 20%/20%/20%/20%. Grant 2 Down Points and 2 Seashell stacks.
Cooldown Time: 8 ally actions.
normal_skill.name: Poseidon's Blessing

normal_skill.desc:
Grant a shield to all allies equal to 33.2%/33.2%/35.9%/35.9% of Miyu's Defense + 1259/1509/1629/1879 + number of Seashell stacks on party x (6.9%/6.9%/7.5%/7.5% of Miyu's Defense + 260/260/336/336) for 3 turns.
Also, if an ally has 4 or more Seashell stacks, increase damage by 2.0%/2.0%/2.2%/2.2% for each stack.
The damage increase effect lasts for 3 turns or until shield is broken, and then lose 2 Seashell stacks.
Cooldown Time: 12 ally actions
normal_skill.name: Tide of Dreams

passive_skill.desc: Increase shield effect by number of party's Seashell stacks x 1.0%.
passive_skill.name: Whispering Waves

passive_skill.desc: Increase ally's Defense by 3.6% for each Seashell stack.
passive_skill.name: I'll Protect You!
